# SEQ30 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 30 focuses on work out the complete structural layout

## Category
Construction

## Patterns
apl209, apl210, apl211, apl212, apl213

## Emergent Phenomena
Coherent structural layouts that efficiently support the intended spatial arrangements

## Overview
This sequence contains 5 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
